mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review (review_title, review_content, review_category, review_grade, group_id, review_id) values(#{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewCategory}, #{reviewGrade}, #{groupId}, #{reviewId})
mapper.select: select review_id, review_title, review_content, review_category, review_register_date, review_update_date, review_grade, group_id from tbl_review

select r.review_id, review_title, review_content, review_category, review_register_date, review_update_date, review_grade, g.group_id, group_name, group_max_value, group_category, group_title, group_content, group_location, group_register_date, group_end_date, group_meet_date, group_file_original_name, group_file_uuid, group_file_path, group_file_size, group_file_type, group_captain from tbl_review r right join tbl_group g on r.group_id = g.group_id where review_id = #{reviewId}
